attributes.action: one day EID holiday on Birth of Prophet Muhammad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many Muslims in the UK feel they require a one day EID holiday to celebrate the Birth of Prophet Muhammad (Peace & Blessings be upon him).

Milad-Un-Nabi is also known as EID to all Muslims.

This is done in many countries, Muslim & Non-Muslim: AFRICAN: Algeria, Benin, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Egypt, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Gambia, Guinea, Libya, Mali, Mauritania, Morocco, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, Tanzania, Tunisia, Togo. MID-EAST: Bahrain, Iran, Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Oman, Palestine, Syria, United Arab Emirates/UAE, Yemen. ASIA: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, India, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malaysia, Sri Lanka, Uzbekistan.

FUTURE DATES FOR MILAD:
1) Tuesday 15th February 2011
2) Saturday 4th February 2012
3) Thursday 24th February 2013

Petition 1: 407 signatures - Tahseen Khalid
Petition 2: 282 signatures - Ali Javed
Petition 3: 281 signatures - Ali Javed

From previous petitions we got 970 signatures.

For this petiton we need 500 or more to get a holiday.
